Chapter.Label: Chapter_Irreps
Chapter.Heading: Irreducible representations of prime-power level
Chapter.Section:
Representations of type D
See .
a record describing (M,Q)
Constructs information about the underlying quadratic module (M,Q) of type D.
a list of lists of the form [S,T]
Constructs the irreducible representation(s) of type D with level p^\lambda corresponding to the character \chi indexed by chi_index.

Representations of type N
See .
a record describing (M,Q)
Constructs information about the underlying quadratic module (M,Q) of type N.
a list of lists of the form [S,T]
Constructs the irreducible representation(s) of type N with level p^\lambda corresponding to the character \chi indexed by chi_index.

Representations of type R
See .
a record describing (M,Q)
Constructs information about the underlying quadratic module (M,Q) of type R.
a list of lists of the form [S,T]
Constructs the irreducible representation(s) of type R with level p^\lambda corresponding to the character \chi indexed by chi_index.
a list of lists of the form [S,T]
Constructs the irreducible representation(s) of unary type R (that is, with \sigma = \lambda) with level p^\lambda.
